newsitem.title: BRAZIL: TENNIS-BRAZIL TAKE DOUBLES AGAINST THE U.S..
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-BRAZIL TAKE DOUBLES AGAINST THE U.S..

text.p: The United States led Brazil 2-1 in their Davis Cup world group first round tie after Brazil, 2-0 down overnight, won the doubles on Saturday.
Jaime Oncins/Gustavo Kuerten (Brazil) beat Alex O'Brien/Richey Reneberg (U.S.) 6-2 6-4 7-5
